rules_text:
Flying, vigilance
[i]Fabric[/i] – {5}: Exile another target creature or enchantment you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each enchantment you control. Activate only as a sorcery and only once each turn.
